Reviews.Title: “Nice and pleasant”
Reviews.Author: RGAAmsterdam
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel on my way to another city, just stopping in IST for one full day for a meeting and leaving at night. I found this hotel myself, by browing TA and then asked my office in IST to book it for me. I arrived early morning from a night flight, so my room was not ready, but it was made ready in about 30 minutes. In the mean time, I checked my email, and had a glass of water kindly brought to me by reception. They also offered me to have breakfast while I wait, but I was not hungry. The room was good, not really small as someone described it in one of the reviews, and everything was fine in the room. Of course, I was not in the hotel for most of the day, but nevertheless. I did not interact much with the reception and other staff, but from what I could judge based on my small interactions with them, they were polite and efficient. Internet was great and worked with no problems, room was clean and the shower was good! I noticed some renovations going on there, but it did not really spoil the entrance area. As usual, the location in Taksim makes any stay great, even a very short one as mine.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay and Service could not be better”
Reviews.Author: ismailTourist
Reviews.Content: Rive hotel is definitely an amazing hotel , rooms are very modern and beds are so comfortable , Rooms provided with LCD TV , window overlooking the city and can be opened partially . The restaurant was very amazing , what's better then having a breakfast in the morning overlooking the local people and the police doing there everyday activities , but the variation wasn't good , it had some basic food not so big. staff were fantastic , though , no one talked English even the reception desk staff , but they were very kind to us , they did their best to make us happy , they always had a smile on their face , they were sitting with us sometimes and laughing with us . very friendly . Cafe was good , perfect juices and tea and coffe. Location could not be better , in the local area , there are tons of hotels but they're inside so they will need more effort getting to The main street then from the main street to Taksim square , but Rive was directly on the same street , though , it was not on it I mean it was little inside for more quietness . it was only 5 mints. walk to Taksim. there were plenty of small groceries just next to the hotel and Mobile cards shop. all people were friendly . and In and before Taksim , there are tons of restaurants including McDonald's and Pizza Hut and Burger King , also there are endless food opportunities at the Istiklal avenue just beside Taksim. Generally , amazing 7 nights stay....

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful City Hotel with professional service”
Reviews.Author: stratosGlyfada
Reviews.Content: I visit Instabul last December for business trip.I have stayed in Riva Hotel in Taksim.Very nice Hotel with helpful staff,excellent service,the food was very nice,the Breakfast with variety of many things,and choice.All rooms are good,well cleaned,and 24 good Room Service.The Hotel is very close on foot to the Shopping center.The Hotel Manager very proffesional ,helpful ,with smile all the time.I propose this Hotel to my customers from Greece,whenever visit Instabul to stay at Riva Hotel.I will come back soon.Thank you

Reviews.Title: “good solution”
Reviews.Author: dafni p
Reviews.Content: great place, delicious buffet, good location and helpful stuff. the rooms are very big and clean and they are clean too!! as a solution, this hotel is a nice solution for the city...

Reviews.Title: “It's worth it!”
Reviews.Author: Tnrahimi
Reviews.Content: First of all the location was perfect,convenient and near to the Taksim sq where you can use the metro for everywhere,just 4-5 minutes to Taksim sq. The rooms were really clean,although they could be a little bigger but they were ok. The breakfast was good,of course there could more warm choices for breakfast The staff were helpful and kind. I had lunch there only once and it was quite good.

Reviews.Title: “Decent !”
Reviews.Author: MayurBhat
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is located in Taksim which is the centre of Modern Istanbul. There are a lot of restaurants in the vicinity. The room rate is decent and the rooms are well kept. Actually the rooms in all hotels in Taksim are small .. this is a good place when the room size comes in the picture. The restaurant gives a decent buffet breakfast and the rooftop eating area is a nice place to sit and eat.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and services!”
Reviews.Author: saharsa
Reviews.Content: we stayed in hotel Riva for a week. Location: it is located just 5 min walk from Taksim square in Istanbul. you can take bus or metro from Taksim square to get all over Istanbul. also you can easily go to "Istiklal" and "Omidzade" streets! Services: our room was small but very clean and comfortable. the staffs were helpful. The breakfast was delicious! egg, fresh bread, fruit juice, meet, ... we didn't eat in restaurant. no idea about that! In all it was very good and I'll back again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not even a three stars hotel !”
Reviews.Author: Daebes
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a 4 night stay. On arrival I stayed for an hour waitng to find a room, although ther had been a prior reservation. They gave me a room for my friend who was supposed to come later on another plane ( he stayed for around 6 hours waitng after that to find a room) & they didn't tell me that I'm taking his room ofcourse, all of this was because the hotel is fully booked. As for the room its around 6 square meters in total. The weather was hot & I tried to fix the A/C in the room but they told me that its working !! I had to stay in the shower most the time in the morning times when i was in the room & can't tell u about the nights there in that hot weather ! Reagrding the only positive thing about that hotel it was its location , 2 mins. walking from Taksim square & Istiklal street.

Reviews.Title: “Slap bang in the centre of Taksim,great location................”
Reviews.Author: corfu_girl_7
Reviews.Content: This hotel ideal if you need to be next to Taksim Square...........I was took to Istanbul as a surprise from my mum,we stayed at the Riva for 3 nights.The breakfasts were lovely but as one of the other reviewers said smoking is allowed in the breakfast room, although a smoker i went outside but others were smoking while folks were eating....plenty of food to chose from and as much as you want.The bedrooms were typical hotel rooms,nothingspecial but clean.................The hotel does look a bit old and in need of a spruce up but otherwise helpful staff and good food means i would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Pingping97
Reviews.Content: It is a nice hotel to stay in Istanbul. There are lots of shops around and the things they sell are quite cheap. When you visit Turkey, never miss buying the brand 'Missbon' coffee flavored candy/sweet. It taste heavenly nice. The cheapest shop around the hotel is sem shop (if i'm not wrong). They sell it at 0.75 YTL while other shop sell them at 1YTL.

Reviews.Title: “a nice hotel at taksim area”
Reviews.Author: mariop79
Reviews.Content: this hotel located at one of the hottest area in istanbul,it took me 4 minutes to walk to taksim square. Room like most other hotel in Taksim area is alittle bit small and from the bath tub condition I have a feeling this hotel is alitle bit old.

Reviews.Title: “Yes i have been to Riva Hotel In Istanbul-Taksim and i do Not regret it !”
Reviews.Author: rdeeb
Reviews.Content: i have read what was written about the hotel,in this web site- before i travelled to Turkey-and now after i'm back i'm surprised about those who said the hotel is bad or their stay in it was unsuceful-or any other negative openion i do belive it to be the best choice of 4 stars in this area..really its just what you need,clean room very well situated location near to isteklal street( 10 mins walk) the shopping street-right infront of the metro station( taksim station-geize park entance) and right beside the bus stop-bed rooms are clean good sized rooms,bathroom clean breakfast is good ,same choices every day fixed yet good, and the best thing there is its a quiet hotel yet near every where this is very im portant pont,the hotels around it are in noisy crouded corners. the staff are really helpful,and nice and smiling, ask about the waiter named ( seleem) in the breakfast he is very helpful and kind the reception were doing thier best to infom me of where to go,and made me use the internet in thier hotel for free . my wifi in my NB could not detect a free wifi signal there, i advise every one to book in this hotel, becuase i toured around to check the other hotels and came to the conclusion that this isone of the best choices made- if this hotel is not avilable for you to book in it-search for another hotel called Mid town( right infront of it)it seemd good too egyptian tourist in istanbul:)

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, helpful staff and central location”
Reviews.Author: Bilgosh
Reviews.Content: I went to Istanbul just for a night to go to a wedding last weekend. I needed to check in the hotel in the morning to get ready for the day time ceremony which was starting at 12:00 pm. So called Riva Hotel reception and asked them if they can arrange a room for me in the morning rather than usual 12:00 check in time. The receptionist told me that it would not be a problem as some guests leave early in the morning due to flight etc. When I got there at about 10:45 am there was no problem about the room. they show the way to my room straight away. Even though I booked a single room they gave me a double room with two single beds. The bathroom needed updating but was very clean so didn't mind it that much. I found the hotel staff very friendly, helpful and proffessional. Also they send one of their staff to currency exchange bureau near them for me as I did not have Turkish Lira on me to pay for the taxi. They brought the money along receipt. Even though it's close to extremely busy Taksim square didn't hear traffic noise at all. It's situated in the corner location on a road off Taksim Square. Very convenient location. The airport shuttle bus stop was just round the corner in the square (30 seconds from hotel) so didn't have any problem to get to the airport in time. I paid only 10 Turkish Lira for the shuttle bus.So all in all it was a very plesant stay. I would definitely recommend this hotel to people who looks for convenience than luxury.

Reviews.Title: “OK - in the best meaning of it”
Reviews.Author: Egotisparo
Reviews.Content: I spent almost a week in this hotel, which revealed itself to be: - very convenient in terms of location; - very clean (Istanbul is NOT a dirty city); and to have: - excellent bed quality, which is probably the most important thing; - very relaxed and smiling staff to check in and out; - and very helpful staff for the breakfast (which is more than average for a hotel of that category). The only weak point is the noise protection, not so much from the streets (the hotel is in a pedestrian zone), but from the rest of the hotel. The hotel is located in Taksim, which is a much more interesting place to stay in than Sultanhamet, if you're to stay fro more than 3 nights. Taksim is very lively, this is where people from Istanbul really live, and it doesn't have this Disneyland-like type of atmosphere that one can encounter in Sultanhamet. Of course, it's not "charming", but at least it's not fake and it has flair. It's very easy to go to Sultanhamet (where the vast majority of monuments is) with the underground funiculaire (5 minutes walking from the hotel) which brings you to the head of the new tramway line that goes to Sultanhamet. I definitively recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “small and smart hotel”
Reviews.Author: matakan
Reviews.Content: small and smart hotel next of the taksim square, istanbul. Hotel staff is very helpfull, rooms are clean and small(but ideal). Its a typical bed and breakfast hotel at the heart of istanbul. There is a metro satation just next to the hotel, that means that; you can reach the most popular shopping centers (cevahir, metro city, kanyon..) by train. Breakfast is normal, but i m prefering tasty turkish cousins for eat. Its not a bussines hotel, i think much better for travellers(tourist)...

Reviews.Title: “A Good One”
Reviews.Author: Pasxalis_pasxaloglou
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Riva 2 times in June and July 2007. Good location, people are friendly and kind. Breakfast is nice. I`d like to stay there again.
